.. py:module:: ComposaPy.stream


Module Contents

Classes
~~~~~~~

.. autoapisummary::

   ComposaPy.stream.CsStream




.. py:class:: CsStream(stream)

   Bases: :py:obj:`io.RawIOBase`

   Base class for raw binary I/O.

   .. py:method:: read(self, size=-1)


   .. py:method:: readable(self)

      Return whether object was opened for reading.

      If False, read() will raise OSError.
